span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 凹陷，凹痕： a depression in a surface made by pressure or a blow
【例】 a dent in the side of a car 汽车侧面一处凹陷
【近】 cavity, depression, hollow, indenture, recess
【反】 bulge, convexity, projection, protrusion, protuberance 凸起
【考法 2】 v. 变小，变弱： to make smaller in amount, volume, or extent
【例】 hopefully this vacation won't dent our bank account too much 但愿这次旅行不会让我们银行存款缩水太多
【近】 abate, downscale, downsize, dwindle
【反】 aggrandize, amplify, augment, boost, enlarge, escalate 增大，增强
【记】 dent 牙齿咬出的凹痕；
【另】 indented 锯齿状的
